title: Setting up a Unifi Cloud Key with a valid SSL cert
snippet: So I recently moved from a self-hosted unifi controller to a unifi cloud key gen2. https://eu.store.ui.com/collections/unifi-accessories-cloud-key/products/unifi-cloud-key-gen2I wanted to be able to access it locally though over https with a valid cert. It turns out the cloudkey just runs a basic...
